column5: After suffering a complete loss due to the fire at the Hwy 36 location, the diner is back and running at Hwy 35 South just below Hwy 7 the past two weeks...  Seeing as how we had a couple of hours to kill after Maribeth had her second cataract operation we ran down to St. Dave's...Still the same great meals !  Congrats to Dave and his staff for all the effort they put into preparing and opening the new diner...  A further congrats to Dave for losing 175 lbs...I had to ask our waitress for confirmation that that was him...(I'm envious)
Nice to hear a good news story.  If I'm over that way I'll stop in. Thanks.
Goos to know. They have an awesome breaky!! Best around imo.  S.
Good to know.  I know there is a Dynasty Chinese Buffet in that area.  Where is it in relation to the Chinese restaurant?

Good to know.  I know there is a Dynasty Chinese Buffet in that area.  Where is it in relation to the Chinese restaurant?  Same side just a little south beside the Petro Canada Service Station...Enjoy !
I think I remember that place when we used to go to Lovesick Lake back, way back when. If it's the same place I can't go back since I lost 25 pounds since New Years, great spread if that's the joint.
